block.p: ERNST & YOUNG, New York, named Beth A. Brooke, national director for tax consulting services, to the new post of vice chairwoman for strategy and corporate development for North America.
INVESTORFORCE.COM,Wayne, Pa., which offers online content, research and analysis tools for asset management, named Robert Hull chief financial officer and chief operating officer.
ERNST & YOUNG, New York, named Beth A. Brooke, national director for tax consulting services, to the new post of vice chairwoman for strategy and corporate development for North America.
INVESTORFORCE.COM,Wayne, Pa., which offers online content, research and analysis tools for asset management, named Robert Hull chief financial officer and chief operating officer.

PLANET HOLLYWOOD INTERNATIONAL, Orlando, Fla., named Christopher R. Thomas president and chief financial officer, succeeding Thomas Avallone, who remains on the board. Mr. Thomas had most recently been president and chief executive at Sizzler USA.
